RESEARCH THEMES

Patterns and drivers of forest mortality, across spatial scales and ecosystem types.

Learn More

Develop science-based adaptation and mitigation strategies for forest management in an increasingly warming and drying world

Learn More

Assess the resilience of groundwater dependent ecosystems during climate extremes and their role in promoting post-disturbance recovery
